description: The Bloomfield River cod, found in a far north Queensland river catchment, is the world's only tropical freshwater cod and scientists are working to have it officially protected amid threats from the climate and introduced species.

en: Scientists rush to protect rare Australian fish species. The Bloomfield River cod, found in a far north Queensland river catchment, is the world's only tropical freshwater cod and scientists are working to have it officially protected amid threats from the climate and introduced species.
